title: Is This Game Fun?
body:
So I've been playing since season 2, and never bothered with ranked.
Once OCE was established and ARAM was added, I've played nothing but (over 6k ARAM's played).
I found teamfights the most enjoyable part of the game, and that's all ARAM is.

I took a break about 10 weeks ago, played 2 games one day, over a month ago.

I returned today, and what do I find? Bad attitudes, lack of teamplay, all the things that made me quit are still so abundant.

Just playing ARAM for a few games, I see ADC's that build nothing but damage bitching at me (when I'm  playing/building tank or support) for being like '10/13/lots of assists' or something, not bad stats, I just wasn't going for kills. And their complaints are entirely hollow. If I wasn't tanking/supporting for them, their stats would be shit too.

Then I get a team of 3 ADC's, a tank (Sion) and I roll Swain. I take AP runes/masteries (as the only magic dmg champ on team) and then find the Sion going AD. I build tank and get rekt trying to protect the ADC's, while our Sion does nothing but try to snipe kills. Whole team is bitching at him, while I'm apologising for not being able to AP and tank at the same time.

Thanks for the reminder of why I quit, I swear the LoL community is the worst in any online game I've ever played.

Why bother playing a team game if all you want is personal glory?

Perhaps one day back is enough and I should quit again for another few months...
(oh, and I'm getting queued with golds/plats, not bronze 5's, so they should know better)

Back to HS for me, maybe I should reinstall PoE? It seems LoL is terminal, and just gets worse over time.
